      • create

        public ReturnType create(java.util.List<java.lang.String> objects,
                org.json.JSONArray records)
                  throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        Create one or more records. Object types can be mixed and can be either standard or custom. Check the developer documentation to see which standard objects are supported in this method
        Parameters:
        objects - list of names of the object types that will be created
        JSONArray - records is an array of records to create. Follow the pattern records = array(array('myobjecttype' => array('field1' => 'value', 'field2' => 'value')), array('myotherobjecttype' => array('field1' => 'value', 'field2' => 'value')));
        Returns:
        ReturnType For JSONObject the result has the following format: { "OVERALL_STATUS":"Success", "ERROR":"NO_ERROR", "CORRECT_RECORDS":[ {"RECORDNO":key,"attribute1":key}, {"RECORDNO":key,"attribute1":key}, {"RECORDNO":key,"attribute1":key} ] }
        Throws:
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException, - Exception The IntacctSDKRuntimeException contains details on the cause of the exception and additionally for multiple records which are correct; the service raises exception on the first record that causes it and raises exception; thus all previous records are correct but due to the semantics of the service - transactional per request - if exception is encountered all changes are rolled back. Here are the details of the cause of the exception { "OVERALL_STATUS":"Failure", "ERROR": [ {"ERROR_MESSAGE": "Another Contact with the given value(s) already exists Use a unique value instead."}, {"ERROR_RECORD": { "attribute1": key, "attribute2": "name"}} ], "CORRECT_RECORDS": [{"RECORDNO":key,"attribute1":key}, {"RECORDNO":key,"attribute1":key}] }
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • update

        public ReturnType update(java.util.List<java.lang.String> objects,
                org.json.JSONArray records)
                  throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        Update one or more records. Object types can be mixed and can be either standard or custom. Check the developer documentation to see which standard objects are supported in this method
        Parameters:
        objects - list of names of the object types that will be updated
        JSONArray - records is an array of records to update. Follow the pattern records = array(array('myobjecttype' => array('field1' => 'value', 'field2' => 'value')), array('myotherobjecttype' => array('field1' => 'value', 'field2' => 'value')));
        Returns:
        ReturnType - for JSON format @see APISession::create
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException

      • delete

        public boolean delete(java.lang.String object,
             java.lang.String keysList)
               throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                      java.lang.Exception
        Delete one or more records
        Parameters:
        String - object integration code of object type to delete
        String - ids String a comma separated list of keys. use 'id' values for custom objects and 'recordno' values for standard objects
        Returns:
        boolean indicating success or failure
        Throws:
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteAll

        public boolean deleteAll(java.lang.String object,
                int max,
                java.lang.String key)
                  throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        WARNING: This method will attempt to delete all records of a given object type Deletes first 10000 by default
        Parameters:
        String - object object type
        key - the pk for the object (RECORDNO or ID)
        Integer - max [optional] Maximum number of records to delete. Default is 10000
        Returns:
        boolean for success; on error exception is raised.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException

      • deleteByQuery

        public boolean deleteByQuery(java.lang.String object,
                    java.lang.String query,
                    int max,
                    java.lang.String key)
                      throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                             java.lang.Exception
        WARNING: This method will attempt to delete all records of a given object type given a query Deletes first 10000 by default
        Parameters:
        String - object object type
        key - the pk for the object (RECORDNO or ID)
        Integer - max [optional] Maximum number of records to delete. Default is 10000
        Returns:
        Integer count of records deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException

      • upsert

        public ReturnType upsert(java.lang.String object,
                org.json.JSONArray records,
                java.lang.String nameField,
                java.lang.String keyField,
                boolean readOnlyName)
                  throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        Checks to see if a record exists. If so, it updates, else it creates
        Parameters:
        String - object The type of object to perform upsert on
        JSONArray - records Array of records to upsert. Should be passed in the same format as used with create and update
        String - nameField the field name used for lookup of existence
        String - keyField the field name used for the internal key (needed for update)
        boolean - readOnlyName Optional. You shouldn't normally set this to true unless the value in the name field is actually set by the platform and you're passing a formulated value that should not be passed in the create or update
        Returns:
        ReturnType in the format requested
        Throws:
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException, - Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • read

        public ReturnType read(java.lang.String object,
              java.lang.String keys,
              java.lang.String fields)
                throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                       java.lang.Exception
        Read one or more records by their key. For platform objects, the key is the 'id' field. For standard objects, the key is the 'recordno' field. Results are returned as a php structured array
        Parameters:
        String - object the integration name for the object
        String - keys a comma separated list of keys for each record you wish to read
        String - fields a comma separated list of fields to return
        Returns:
        Array of records
        Throws:
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • readByQuery

        public ReturnType readByQuery(java.lang.String object,
                     java.lang.String query,
                     java.lang.String fields,
                     int maxRecords)
                       throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Read records using a query. Specify the object you want to query and something like a "where" clause
        Parameters:
        String - object the object upon which to run the query
        String - query the query string to execute. Use SQL operators
        String - fields A comma separated list of fields to return
        int - maxRecords number of records to return. Defaults to 100000
        string - returnFormat Pass one of the valid constants from api_returnFormat class
        Returns:
        JSONArray result Array of objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException

        public ReturnType readByName(java.lang.String object,
                    java.lang.String keys,
                    java.lang.String fields)
                      throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                             java.lang.Exception
        Read an object by its name field (vid for standard objects)
        Parameters:
        String - object the integration name for the object
        String - keys a comma separated list of keys for each record you wish to read
        String - fields a comma separated list of fields to return
        Returns:
        ReturnType with a collection of results
        Throws:
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • readRelated

        public ReturnType readRelated(java.lang.String object,
                     java.lang.String keys,
                     java.lang.String relation,
                     java.lang.String fields)
                       throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Reads all the records related to a source record through a named relationship.
        Parameters:
        String - object the integration name of the object
        String - keys a comma separated list of 'id' values of the source records from which you want to read related records
        String - relation the name of the relationship. This will determine the type of object you are reading
        String - fields a comma separated list of fields to return
        Returns:
        ReturnType containing the records.
        Throws:
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
        java.lang.Exception

        public ReturnType inspect(java.lang.String object,
                 boolean detail)
                   throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                          java.lang.Exception
        Inspect an object to get a list of its fields
        Parameters:
        String - object The integration name of the object. Pass '*' to get a complete list of objects
        bool - detail Whether or not to return data type information for the fields.
        Returns:
        ReturnType with metadata of the object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException

      • invokeService

        public ReturnType invokeService(java.lang.String xml,
                       boolean multiInvocation,
                       java.lang.String dtdVersion)
                         throws IntacctSDKRuntimeException,
                                java.lang.Exception
        Run any Intacct API method not directly implemented in this class. You must pass a valid XML for the method you wish to invoke. Uses 3.0 API definitions if dtdVersion is null
        Parameters:
        String - xml valid XML for the method you wish to invoke or collection of functions to invoke
        string - dtdVersion Either "2.1" or "3.0" defaults to "3.0" if parameter is null
        boolean - multiInvocation true if the xml contains multiple functions; false otherwise
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        IntacctSDKRuntimeException
